references.paper_title: DeepCAD: A deep generative network for computer-aided design models
references.reason: This paper introduces the DeepCAD dataset, a large-scale dataset of CAD models used for training and evaluating CAD generation models in this paper.

references.paper_title: SpexGen: Autoregressive generation of CAD construction sequences with disentangled codebooks
references.reason: This paper proposes SkexGen, a design variation model used in this paper's automated data synthesis pipeline to generate pairs of original and edited CAD models.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical neural coding for controllable CAD model generation
references.reason: This paper introduces Hnc-CAD, another design variation model leveraged in this work's data synthesis pipeline, offering improvements over previous methods.

references.paper_title: FlexCAD: Unified and versatile controllable CAD generation with fine-tuned large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces FlexCAD, a baseline model compared against in this work, providing a point of reference for evaluating the proposed text-based CAD editing approach.

references.paper_title: Text2CAD: Generating sequential CAD designs from beginner-to-expert level text prompts
references.reason: This paper explores text-based CAD generation, a related task that shares similarities with the focus of this paper, providing valuable insights and a comparison point.
